text: @NYGovCuomo We're asking to be TESTED for antibodies, that's how you get a true death rate of a NEW virus, which happens on a regular basis and has happened for centuries. 90% caught it 3 months before we were told to quarantine. Shouldn't deaths by this deadly covid19, be in the millions?
